original: “Eso, mahārāja, vihāro saṁvutadvāro. Tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno ālindaṁ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṁ ākoṭehi; vivarissati te bhagavā dvāran”ti.

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena so vihāro saṁvutadvāro, tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno ālindaṁ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṁ ākoṭesi. Vivari bhagavā dvāraṁ.

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo vihāraṁ pavisitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati nāmañca sāveti:

original: Atha kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:

original: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato: ‘sakadāgāmī satto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno’ti.

original: Kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan”ti?
analyzed: katham katham nāmāya bhante ānanda bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ aññeyyaḥ yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho sama sama gatikāḥ bhavissanti abhisamparāyanti
evam khalu pana ita bhagini bhagavatā byākatanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando migasālāya upāsikāya nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā
ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu bhante migasālā upāsikā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnā khalu bhante migasālā upāsikā mam etat avoca

original: ‘Kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṁ.

original: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato—sakadāgāmī satto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.

original: Dasayime, ānanda, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.

ā kaṅkha vagga
tayodhammasutta

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā loke na saṁvijjeyyuṁ, na tathāgato loke uppajjeyya arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, na tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhammā loke na savijjeyyu na tathāgataḥ loke uppajjeyya araham sammāsambuddhaḥ na tathāgata ppaveditaḥ dhamma vinayaḥ loke dibbeyya
katame tayaḥ
jāti ca jarā ca maraṇañca

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā loke na saṁvijjeyyuṁ, na tathāgato loke uppajjeyya arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, na tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo dhammā loke na savijjeyyu na tathāgataḥ loke uppajjeyya araham sammāsambuddhaḥ na tathāgata ppaveditaḥ dhamma vinayaḥ loke dibbeyya

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, ime tayo dhammā loke saṁvijjanti tasmā tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, tasmā tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbati.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhave ime tayaḥ dhammā loke savijjanti tasmā tathāgataḥ loke uppajjati araham sammāsambuddho tasmā tathāgata ppaveditaḥ dhamma vinayaḥ loke dibbati

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo jātiṁ pahātuṁ jaraṁ pahātuṁ maraṇaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhamme a pahāya abhabbaḥ jātim pahātum jaram pahātum maraṇam pahātu
katame tayaḥ

original: Rāgaṁ appahāya, dosaṁ appahāya, mohaṁ appahāya—
analyzed: rāgam appahāya dosam appahāya moham appahāya

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo muṭṭhassaccaṁ pahātuṁ asampajaññaṁ pahātuṁ cetaso vikkhepaṁ pahātuṁ.

original: Ariyānaṁ adassanakamyataṁ appahāya, ariyadhammassa asotukamyataṁ appahāya, upārambhacittataṁ appahāya—
analyzed: ariyānam a dassana kamyatam appahāya ariya dhammassa a sotu kamyatam appahāya upārambha citta tam appahāya

analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhamme a pahāya abhabbaḥ ariyānam a dassana kamyatam pahātum ariya dhammassa a sotu kamyatam pahātum upārambha citta tam pahātu

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahāya abhabbo ariyānaṁ adassanakamyataṁ pahātuṁ ariyadhammassa asotukamyataṁ pahātuṁ upārambhacittataṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo dhamme a pahāya abhabbaḥ ariyānam a dassana kamyatam pahātum ariya dhammassa a sotu kamyatam pahātum upārambha citta tam pahātu

analyzed: assaddhiyam appahāya avadaññu tam appahāya kosajjam appahāya

original: Anādariyaṁ appahāya, dovacassataṁ appahāya, pāpamittataṁ appahāya—
analyzed: an ādariyam appahāya dovacassatam appahāya pāpa mitta tam appahāya

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahāya abhabbo assaddhiyaṁ pahātuṁ avadaññutaṁ pahātuṁ kosajjaṁ pahātuṁ.

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo anādariyaṁ pahātuṁ dovacassataṁ pahātuṁ pāpamittataṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhamme a pahāya abhabbaḥ anādariyam pahātum dovacassatam pahātum pāpa mitta tam pahātu
katame tayaḥ

original: Ahirikaṁ appahāya, anottappaṁ appahāya, pamādaṁ appahāya—
analyzed: ahirikam appahāya anottappam appahāya pamādam appahāya

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahāya abhabbo anādariyaṁ pahātuṁ dovacassataṁ pahātuṁ pāpamittataṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo dhamme a pahāya abhabbaḥ anādariyam pahātum dovacassatam pahātum pāpa mitta tam pahātu
ahirikaḥ ya bhikkhave an ottāpī pamattaḥ hoti

original: So pamatto samāno abhabbo anādariyaṁ pahātuṁ dovacassataṁ pahātuṁ pāpamittataṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ pamattaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ anādariyam pahātum dovacassatam pahātum pāpa mitta tam pahātu

original: So pāpamitto samāno abhabbo assaddhiyaṁ pahātuṁ avadaññutaṁ pahātuṁ kosajjaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ pāpa mittaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ assaddhiyam pahātum avadaññu tam pahātum kosajjam pahātu

original: So kusīto samāno abhabbo uddhaccaṁ pahātuṁ asaṁvaraṁ pahātuṁ dussilyaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kusītaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ uddhaccam pahātum asavaram pahātum dussilyam pahātu

original: So dussīlo samāno abhabbo ariyānaṁ adassanakamyataṁ pahātuṁ ariyadhammassa asotukamyataṁ pahātuṁ upārambhacittataṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ dussīlaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ ariyānam a dassana kamyatam pahātum ariya dhammassa a sotu kamyatam pahātum upārambha citta tam pahātu

original: So upārambhacitto samāno abhabbo muṭṭhassaccaṁ pahātuṁ asampajaññaṁ pahātuṁ cetaso vikkhepaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ upārambha cittaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ muṭṭhassaccam pahātum asampajaññam pahātum cetasaḥ vikkhepam pahātu

original: So vikkhittacitto samāno abhabbo ayonisomanasikāraṁ pahātuṁ kummaggasevanaṁ pahātuṁ cetaso līnattaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ vikkhitta cittaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ a yoniso manasikāram pahātum kummagga sevanam pahātum cetasaḥ līnattam pahātu

original: So līnacitto samāno abhabbo sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ pahātuṁ vicikicchaṁ pahātuṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ līna cittaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ sakkāya diṭṭhim pahātum vicikiccham pahātum sīlabbata parāmāsam pahātu

original: So vicikiccho samāno abhabbo rāgaṁ pahātuṁ dosaṁ pahātuṁ mohaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ vicikicchaḥ samānaḥ abhabbaḥ rāgam pahātum dosam pahātum moham pahātu

original: So rāgaṁ appahāya dosaṁ appahāya mohaṁ appahāya abhabbo jātiṁ pahātuṁ jaraṁ pahātuṁ maraṇaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ rāgam appahāya dosam appahāya moham appahāya abhabbaḥ jātim pahātum jaram pahātum maraṇam pahātu

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo jātiṁ pahātuṁ jaraṁ pahātuṁ maraṇaṁ pahātuṁ.
analyzed: tayo ume bhikkhave dhamme pahāya bhabbaḥ jātim pahātum jaram pahātum maraṇam pahātu
katame tayaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘appassuto samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu appassutaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘dubbaco samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘pāpamitto samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘kusīto samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘muṭṭhassati samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu muṭṭhassati samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘asantuṭṭho samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘pāpiccho samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘micchādiṭṭhiko samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘imehi dasahi dhammehi samannāgato imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘saddho samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.

analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu kalyāṇa mittaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu āraddha vīriyaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu upaṭṭhitassati samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘santuṭṭho samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu santuṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘appiccho samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu appicchaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘sammādiṭṭhiko samāno imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhikaḥ samānaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatānanda, bhikkhu ‘imehi dasahi dhammehi samannāgato imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.

original: ohitasoto ca dhammaṁ suṇāti, no ca sutvā dhammaṁ dhāreti …
analyzed: ohita soto ca dhammam suṇāti no ca sutvā dhammam dhāreti

original: dhātānañca dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhati no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti …

original: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, padhānaṁ padahato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṁ padhānaṁ padahitabbanti vadāmi.
analyzed: yat ca khvassa gahapati padhānam padahataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti evarūpam padhānam padahitabbanti vadāmi

original: Yañhi, gahapati, paṭinissaggaṁ paṭinissajjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpo paṭinissaggo na paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi.
analyzed: yat hi gahapati paṭinissaggam paṭinissajjataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti evarūpaḥ paṭinissaggaḥ na paṭinissajjitabbaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, paṭinissaggaṁ paṭinissajjato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpo paṭinissaggo paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi.
analyzed: yat ca khvassa gahapati paṭinissaggam paṭinissajjataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti evarūpaḥ paṭinissaggaḥ paṭinissajjitabbaḥ ti vadāmi

original: Yañhi, gahapati, vimuttiṁ vimuccato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpā vimutti na vimuccitabbāti vadāmi.
analyzed: yat hi gahapati vimuttim vimuccataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti evarūpā vimutti na vimuccitabbā ati vadāmi

original: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, vimuttiṁ vimuccato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpā vimutti vimuccitabbāti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: yat ca khvassa gahapati vimuttim vimuccataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti evarūpā vimutti vimuccitabbā ati vadāmi iti

original: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho vajjiyamāhitaḥ gahapati bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante vajjiyamāhite gahapatimhi bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā acira pakkante vajjiyamāhite gahapatimhi bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dīgharattaṁ apparajakkho imasmiṁ dhammavinaye, sopi
analyzed: yaḥ api saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu dīgharattam apparajakkhaḥ imasmin dhammavinaye saḥ api

analyzed: saḥ tassa nagarassa samantā anupariyāya patham anukkamati anupariyāya patham anukkamamānaḥ na passeyya pākāra sandhim vā pākāra vivaram vā antamasaḥ biḷāra nikkhamana mattam pi

original: No ca khvassa evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti: ‘ettakā pāṇā imaṁ nagaraṁ pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā’ti.

original: Atha khvassa evamettha hoti: ‘ye kho keci oḷārikā pāṇā imaṁ nagaraṁ pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā, sabbe te iminā dvārena pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā’ti.

original: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso uttiya, na tathāgatassa evaṁ ussukkaṁ hoti: ‘sabbo vā tena loko nīyati, upaḍḍho vā, tibhāgo vā’ti.

analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyehi rūpehi iṭṭhehi kantehi manāpehi piya rūpehi kāma upasahitehi rajanīyehi
sota viññeyyehi saddehi
ghāna viññeyyehi gandhehi
jivhā viññeyyehi rasehi

original: kāyaviññeyyehi phoṭṭhabbehi iṭṭhehi kantehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṁhitehi rajanīyehi.
analyzed: kāya viññeyyehi phoṭṭhabbehi iṭṭhehi kantehi manāpehi piya rūpehi kāma upasahitehi rajanīyehi
tam kim maññasi upāli

original: nanvāyaṁ khiḍḍā purimāhi khiḍḍāhi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā cā”ti?
analyzed: nanu āyam khiḍḍā purimāhi khiḍḍāhi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca ati
eva bhante

original: “Idha kho pana vo, upāli, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
analyzed: idha kho pana vaḥ upāli tathāgataḥ loke uppajjati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampannaḥ sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Taṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṁ vā kule paccājāto.
analyzed: tam dhammam suṇāti gahapati vā gahapati putto vā aññatarasmim vā kule paccājātaḥ

original: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: saḥ tam dhammam sutvā tathāgate saddham paṭilabhati

original: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ tena saddhā paṭilābhena samannāgataḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati
sambādhaḥ gharāvāsaḥ rajāpathaḥ abbhokāsaḥ pabbajjā

original: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: So aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya
analyzed: so aparena samayena appam vā bhogakkhandham pahāya mahantam vā bhogakkhandham pahāya

original: appaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā
analyzed: appam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya mahantam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya kesa massuṃ ohāretvā

original: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
analyzed: kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ bhikkhūnam sikkhā sājīva samāpanno pāṇa atipātam pahāya pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti nihita daṇḍaḥ nihita satthaḥ lajjī dayā āpannaḥ sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī viharati

original: Adinnādānaṁ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī; athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharati.
analyzed: a dinna ādānam pahāya a dinna ādānā paṭivirataḥ hoti dinna ādāyī dinna pāṭikaṅkhī atha enena sucibhūtena attanā viharati

original: Abrahmacariyaṁ pahāya brahmacārī hoti ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
analyzed: a brahmacariyam pahāya brahmacārī hoti ārā cārī virataḥ methunā gāma dhammā

original: Musāvādaṁ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṁvādako lokassa.
analyzed: musāvādam pahāya musāvādā paṭivirataḥ hoti sacca vādī sacca sandho theto paccayikaḥ a visavādakaḥ lokassa

original: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, ito sutvā na amutra akkhātā
analyzed: pisuṇam vācam pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirataḥ hoti itas sutvā na amutra akkhātā

original: imesaṁ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā na imesaṁ akkhātā amūsaṁ bhedāya. Iti bhinnānaṁ vā
analyzed: imesam bhedāya amutra vā sutvā na imesam akkhātāḥ amūsam bhedāya iti bhinnānam vā

original: sandhātā sahitānaṁ vā anuppadātā, samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī; samaggakaraṇiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
analyzed: sandhātā sahitānam vai anuppadātā samagga ārāmaḥ samagga rataḥ samagga nandī samagga karaṇim vācam bhāsitā hoti

original: Pharusaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti. Yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
analyzed: pharusam vācam pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirataḥ hoti yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇa sukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahu jana kantā bahu jana manāpā tathārūpim vācam bhāsitā hoti

original: Samphappalāpaṁ pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī
analyzed: samphappalāpam pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirataḥ hoti kāla vādī bhūta vādī attha vādī

original: dhammavādī vinayavādī, nidhānavatiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti kālena sāpadesaṁ pariyantavatiṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma vādī vinaya vādī nidhānavatim vācam bhāsitā hoti kālena sa apadesam pariyantavatim attha sahita
saḥ bīja gāma bhūta gāma samārambhā paṭivirataḥ hoti
eka bhattikaḥ hoti rattu uparataḥ virataḥ vikāla bhojanā
nacca gīta vādita visūka dassanā paṭivirataḥ hoti
mālā gandha vilepana dhāraṇa maṇḍana vibhūsana ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ hoti

jātarūpa rajata paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
āmaka dhañña paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
āmaka masa paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
itthi kumārika paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti

ajeḷaka paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
kukkuṭa sūkara paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
hatthi ga vassa vaḷava paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
khetta vatthu paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ hoti
dūteyya pahiṇa gamana anuyogā paṭivirataḥ hoti
kaya vikkayā paṭivirataḥ hoti
tulā kūṭaka sa kūṭa māna kūṭā paṭivirataḥ hoti
ukkoṭana vañcana nikati sāci yogā paṭivirataḥ hoti
chedana vadha bandhana viparāmosa ālopa sahasākārā paṭivirataḥ hoti

original: So santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
analyzed: so santuṭṭhaḥ hoti kāya parihārikena cīvarena kucchi parihārikena piṇḍapātena
yena yena iva pakkamati samādāya iva pakkamati

original: seyyathāpi nāma pakkhī sakuṇo yena yeneva ḍeti sapattabhārova ḍeti.
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma pakkhī sakuṇaḥ yena yena iva ḍeti sa patta bhāraḥ uva ḍeti

original: Evamevaṁ bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena. Yena yeneva pakkamati samādāyeva pakkamati.
analyzed: evam evam bhikkhu santuṭṭhaḥ hoti kāya parihārikena cīvarena kucchi parihārikena piṇḍapātena yena yena iva pakkamati samādāya iva pakkamati

original: So iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: saḥ iminā ariyena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ ajjhattam anavajja sukham paṭisavedeti

original: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: so cakkhunā rūpam disvā na nimitta ggāhī hoti na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam cakkhu indriyam asavutam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ, cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyu tassa savarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhu indriya cakkhu indriye savaram āpajjati
sotena saddam sutvā
ghānena gandham ghāyitvā
jivhāya rasam sāyitvā
kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā

original: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: manasā dhammam viññāya na nimitta ggāhī hoti na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam man indriyam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati manindriyaṁ, manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyu tassa savarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriya manindriye savaram āpajjati

original: So iminā ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ abyāsekasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: saḥ iminā ariyena indriya savarena samannāgataḥ ajjhattam a byāseka sukham paṭisaveda iti

original: So abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti, ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti,
analyzed: saḥ abhikkante paṭikkante sampajāna kārī hoti ālokite vilokite sampajāna kārī hoti

original: samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī hoti,
analyzed: samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe sampajānakārī hoti

original: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī hoti,
analyzed: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajāna kārī hoti uccāra passāva kamme sampajāna kārī hoti

original: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
analyzed: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī hoti

original: So iminā ca ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato, iminā ca ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato, iminā ca ariyena satisampajaññena samannāgato
analyzed: so iminā ca ariyena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ iminā ca ariyena indriya savarena samannāgataḥ iminā ca ariyena sati sampajaññena samannāgataḥ

original: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
analyzed: vivittam senāsanam bhajati araññam rukkha mūlam pabbatam kandaram giri guham su sānam vana pattham abbhokāsam palāla puñja

original: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: saḥ arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: saḥ abhijjham loke pahāya vigata abhijjhena cetasā viharati abhijjhāya cittam parisodheti

original: Byāpādapadosaṁ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: byāpāda padosam pahāya a byāpanna cittaḥ viharati sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī byāpāda padosā cittam parisodheti

original: Thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: thinamiddham pahāya vigata thinamiddhaḥ viharati āloka saññī sataḥ sampajānaḥ thinamiddhā cittam parisodheti

original: Uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam pahāya anuddhataḥ viharati ajjhattam vūpasanta cittaḥ uddhacca kukkuccā cittam parisodheti

original: Vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchāya cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: vicikiccham pahāya tiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ viharati a kathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu vicikicchāya cittam parisodheti

original: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe,
analyzed: saḥ ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetasaḥ upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe

original: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati
tam kim maññasi upāli

original: “Imampi kho, upāli, mama sāvakā attani dhammaṁ sampassamānā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevanti, no ca kho tāva anuppattasadatthā viharanti.

original: Puna caparaṁ, upāli, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.

analyzed: puna caparaḥ upāli bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā pe tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma.
analyzed: yat nūna mayam yena āyasmai mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma

original: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimhā; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ apucchimhā.
analyzed: atha kho bhante yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkamimha upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham apucchimhā

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi akkharehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho suvibhatto”ti.
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi akkharehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi atthaḥ su vibhattaḥ ti

kassa naḥ tva cunda soceyyāni rocesi iti

original: “Brāhmaṇā, bhante, pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti; tesāhaṁ soceyyāni rocemī”ti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bhante pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevāla mālikā aggi paricārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti tesāham soceyyāni rocemi iti

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, cunda, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapentī”ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana cunda brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevāla mālikā aggi paricārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti iti

original: “Idha, bhante, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā. Te sāvakaṁ evaṁ samādapenti:
analyzed: idha bhante brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevāla mālikā aggi paricārikā udakorohakā te sāvakam evam samādapenti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, ambho purisa, kālasseva uṭṭhahantova sayanamhā pathaviṁ āmaseyyāsi;
analyzed: ehi tva ambho purisa kālassa iva uṭṭhahantaḥ iva sayanamhā pathavim āmaseyyāsi

original: no ce pathaviṁ āmaseyyāsi, allāni gomayāni āmaseyyāsi;
analyzed: no ce pathavim āmaseyyā asi allāni gomayāni āmaseyyā asi

original: no ce allāni gomayāni āmaseyyāsi, haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyāsi;
analyzed: no ce allāni gomayāni āmaseyyā asi haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyā asi

original: no ce haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyāsi, aggiṁ paricareyyāsi;
analyzed: no ce haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyāsi aggim paricareyyāsi

original: no ce aggiṁ paricareyyāsi, pañjaliko ādiccaṁ namasseyyāsi;
analyzed: no ce aggim paricareyyāsi pañjalikaḥ ādiccam namasseyyāsi

original: no ce pañjaliko ādiccaṁ namasseyyāsi, sāyatatiyakaṁ udakaṁ oroheyyāsī’ti.
analyzed: no ce pañjalikaḥ ādiccam namasseyyāsi sa āyatatiyakam udakam oroheyyāsi iti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhante, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti; tesāhaṁ soceyyāni rocemī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho bhante brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevāla mālikā aggi paricārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti tesāham soceyyāni rocemi iti

original: “Aññathā kho, cunda, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: aññathā kho cunda brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevāla mālikā aggi paricārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye soceyyam hoti iti

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṁ hoti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana bhante ariyassa vinaye soceyyam hoti

original: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhante bhagavā tathā dhammam desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye soceyyam hoti iti

original: “Tena hi, cunda, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho cundaḥ kammāra putto bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Kāmesumicchācārī hoti. Yā tā māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā
analyzed: kāmesumicchā cārī hoti yā tā mātu rakkhitā pitu rakkhitā mātā pitu rakkhitā bhātu rakkhitā

original: pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho: ‘ehambho purisa, yaṁ

original: jānāsi taṁ vadehī’ti, so ajānaṁ vā āha: ‘jānāmī’ti, jānaṁ vā āha: ‘na jānāmī’ti;
analyzed: jānāsi tam vadehi iti saḥ a jānam vai āha jānāmi iti jānam vai āha na jānāmi iti

original: apassaṁ vā āha: ‘passāmī’ti, passaṁ vā āha: ‘na passāmī’ti. Iti attahetu vā parahetu
analyzed: a passam vā āha passāmi iti passam vā āha na passāmi iti iti atta hetu vā para hetu

original: vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
analyzed: vā āmisa kiñcikkha hetu vā sampajāna musā bhāsitā hoti

original: Pisuṇavāco hoti. Ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṁ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā imesaṁ
analyzed: pisuṇa vācaḥ hoti itas sutvā amutra akkhātāḥ imesam bhedāya amutra vā sutvā

original: akkhātā amūsaṁ bhedāya. Iti samaggānaṁ vā bhettā, bhinnānaṁ vā anuppadātā, vaggārāmo
analyzed: akkhātā amūsam bhedāya iti samaggānam vā bhettā bhinnānam vā anuppadātā vagga ārāmaḥ

original: vaggarato vagganandī vaggakaraṇiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.

original: Pharusavāco hoti. Yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṁvattanikā, tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.

original: Samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī; anidhānavatiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṁ apariyantavatiṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: samphappalāpī hoti akāla vādī abhūta vādī anattha vādī adhamma vādī avinaya vādī anidhānavatim vācam bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesam apariyantavatim anattha sahita

analyzed: evam kho cunda catubbidham vācāya a soceyyam hoti

original: Idha, cunda, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti. Yaṁ taṁ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṁ taṁ abhijjhātā hoti: ‘aho vata yaṁ parassa taṁ mamassā’ti.

original: Idha, cunda, ekacco pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.

original: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so peto ñātisālohito taṁ ṭhānaṁ anupapanno hoti, ko taṁ dānaṁ paribhuñjatī”ti?

original: “Aññepissa, brāhmaṇa, petā ñātisālohitā taṁ ṭhānaṁ upapannā honti, te taṁ dānaṁ paribhuñjantī”ti.
analyzed: aññe pi ssa brāhmaṇa petā ñāti sālohitā tam ṭhānam upapannāḥ honti te tam dānam paribhuñjanti iti

original: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṁ ṭhānaṁ anupapanno hoti aññepissa ñātisālohitā petā taṁ ṭhānaṁ anupapannā honti, ko taṁ dānaṁ paribhuñjatī”ti?
analyzed: sace pana bho gotama saḥ ca iva petaḥ ñāti sālohito tam ṭhānam anupapanno hoti aññe pi issa ñāti sālohitā petā tam ṭhānam anupapannāḥ honti kaḥ tam dānam paribhuñjati iti

original: “Aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ vivittaṁ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṁ petehi ñātisālohitehi.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam kho eta brāhmaṇa anavakāsaḥ yat tam ṭhānam vivittam assa iminā dīghena addhunā yat idam petehi ñāti sālohitehi
api ca brāhmaṇa dāyakaḥ api anipphalaḥ ti
aṭṭhāne pi bhavam gotamo parikappam vadati iti
aṭṭhāne api kho aha brāhmaṇa parikappam vadāmi

analyzed: idha brāhmaṇaḥ ekacco pāṇa atipātī hoti adinna ādāyī hoti kāmesumicchā cārī hoti musāvādī
